author: _shemnon
content: The overhead of Merkle Trie generation is absolutely something to be concerned about.  Right now it is a top performance concern for multiple clients.

author: _shemnon
content: If done from a block witness most of the performance issues subside.

author: _shemnon
content: (assuming said witness also has an output witness)

author: s1na
content: I'm measuring now how much the CREATE costs should be bumped to cover the overhead. For the hexary trie seems to be between 0-60k gas (60k for 24k contract size)

author: s1na
content: So you're right, it's significant enough to warrant a cost increase of a few percents
